meanings.definition: A person who practices medicine; a medical practitioner.
meanings.sent1: The medicos at the hospital work hard to help patients.
meanings.sent2: The medicos in the clinic are always ready to assist those in need.
meanings.sent3: The medicos decided to have a friendly competition to see who could diagnose a fake illness the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The small town was in need of more medicos to heal its ailing residents.
meanings.sent5: The medicos' dedication to their profession is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to medicine or medical practitioners.
meanings.sent1: The medicos conference focused on the latest advancements in healthcare.
meanings.sent2: She wore a stethoscope around her neck, giving her a medicos look.
meanings.sent3: The medicos-themed party had guests dressed as doctors and nurses.
meanings.sent4: His medicos knowledge helped him understand complex medical terms easily.
meanings.sent5: The medicos community came together to support each other during challenging times.
